name: hexapinod
description: Hexagonal Architecture API Framework/Skeleton in TypeScript and using nodeJS with expressJS.

scripts.test: npm run test-lint && npm run test-unit
scripts.test-lint: npx eslint . --ignore-pattern 'apidoc/' --ignore-pattern 'documentation/' --ignore-pattern 'api-documentation/' --ignore-pattern 'dist/' ; EXIT_STATUS=$? ; jsonlint -q ./config/**/*.json ./src/**/*.json ; EXIT_STATUS=$? ; exit $EXIT_STATUS ;
scripts.test-unit: npx tsc --project tsconfig.json --skipLibCheck && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.json -f && npx mocha -n enable-source-maps ./dist/src/application/tests/**/*.test.js
scripts.serve: npx nodemon --watch src/ -e ts --ignore 'src/**/*.spec.ts' --exec 'npx tsc --project tsconfig.json --skipLibCheck && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.json -f && node --enable-source-maps  ./dist/app.js server'
scripts.cli: npx tsc --project tsconfig.json --skipLibCheck && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.json -f && node --enable-source-maps  ./dist/app.js
scripts.build: npx tsc --project tsconfig.json && npx tsc-alias -p tsconfig.json -f

apidoc.name: Hexapinod
apidoc.description: Hexagonal Architecture API Framework/Skeleton in TypeScript and using nodeJS with expressJS.
apidoc.title: Hexapinod
